title: Halo Infinite
description: The legendary Halo series returns with the most expansive Master Chief campaign yet and a groundbreaking free-to-play multiplayer experience.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel i5-4440, 8GB RAM, AMD RX 570 or NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or Intel i7-9700k, 16GB RAM, AMD RX 5700 XT or NVIDIA RTX 2070

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G, 12GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 590

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Your Ultimate Horizon Adventure awaits! Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel i5-4460, 8GB RAM, AMD RX 470 or NVIDIA GTX 970
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or Intel i5-8400, 16GB RAM, AMD RX 590 or NVIDIA GTX 1070

title: Elden Ring
description: Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X, 12GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, 16GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX VEGA 56

title: Gears 5
description: From one of gaming's most acclaimed sagas, Gears 5 delivers the biggest, most dramatic Gears of War campaign ever.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: America, 1899. The end of the wild west era has begun. After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-6300, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 280
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, 12GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480

title: Sea of Thieves
description: Sea of Thieves offers the essential pirate experience, from sailing and fighting to exploring and looting - everything you need to live the pirate life.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. Before you stands a war-torn, monster-infested continent you can explore at will.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Phenom II X4 940, 6GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator
description: From light planes to wide-body jets, fly highly detailed and accurate aircraft in an incredibly realistic world.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Gather your party, and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival, and the lure of absolute power.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i5-4690 or AMD FX 8350, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600, 16GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super or AMD RX 5700 XT

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
description: The most advanced Call of Duty ever created. Modern Warfare III brings the cinematic, immersive experience to the next level.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, 16GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT

title: EA FC 24
description: Experience the beautiful game like never before with EA SPORTS FC 24. Powered by Football, built by EA SPORTS.

systemRequirements.minimum: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570
systemRequirements.recommended: Windows 10 64-bit, Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, 12GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 590
